name: Airplane Helicopter Osprey Rescue
description:
Help save shipwrecked people and get them to safety in this fun filled, action flying game, Airplane Helicopter Pilot 3D. Be the brave pilot of the osprey aircraft, which can turn into two flying modes, helicopter and airplane. Airplane mode will help you get to the stranded people quickly and the helicopter flight mode is used to lower the rope and allow the people to get on the plane safely. Fly around this huge open world looking for people in need of rescuing and be the savior they need.

GAME FEATURES:
- Unique Osprey aircraft, transform and fly in both airplane and helicopter mode
- Massive tropical island environment, explore and search the ocean and islands!
- Action-packed flight missions, help save helpless stranded people
- Realistic flying physics, simulating real plane and helicopter flying
- Easy to use flight controls, includes both touch and tilt


Help save stranded people in the real flying simulation, get to experience what it is like to be a real search and rescue pilot and get to fly the super cool Osprey VTOL (vertical take off and landing) aircraft. Sound fun to you? Want to explore ship wrecks and exotic tropical islands for stranded people? Get into the pilot seat and start helping people in the exciting flying simulator, Airplane Helicopter Pilot 3D!
